metadata.title: CVE-2016-5427 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: PowerDNS (aka pdns) Authoritative Server before 3.4.10 does not properlyhandle a . (dot) inside labels, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (backend CPU consumption) via a crafted DNS query.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
